sentences.sContent: Can you adduce any reason for His strange behavior?
sentences.sContent_eng: Can you adduce any reason for His strange behavior?
sentences.sCn: 你是否能举出任何理由来说明他的奇特行为？

remMethod.val: ad(向) + duc (引导) + e → 引导出 → 举出

words.tran: 引用，引证；内转；内收作用

trans.tranOther: to cite (reasons, examples, etc) as evidence or proof
